officialTitle: Comparison of Gastric By-Pass and Optimized Medical Treatment in Obese Diabetic Patients in Terms of Mortality, Glycemic Control, and Cost Effectiveness - Prospective, Multicenter, Randomized Study
inclusionCriteria:
* Type 2 diabetes mellitus with HbA1c \> 7.5 %
* Body mass index \> 35 and \< 50 kg/m2
* Candidate for Gastric By-Pass
* Treatment with GLP1 (glucagon-like peptide) analogue or insulin
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Contraindication to bariatric surgery
* Pregnancy
* Affiliation of health care assurance
* Psychiatric disorders
